announce.message: Citizens of Yalahar, beware! Harbingers of vampiric blood thirst are appearing in the city. Fight them or take your chance to flee while you still can.
The sky over Yalahar is darkened by many little wings. Whoever isn't ready to fight the greater evil approaching, seek refuge inside the houses.
Vampires have arrived in Yalahar - looking for humans to feed on and quench their blood thirst.
